oai_dc:dc.dc:title: More effective agricultural water protection (TEHO project 2008-2010)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rasa, Kimmo
Kulmala, Airi
Talola, Sami
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: TEHO project is focused on agricultural water protection issues in the area of southwest Finland, which cover around 12000 farms and 20 % of Finnish arable land.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rasa, Kimmo; Kulmala, Airi and Talola, Sami (2008) More effective agricultural water protection (TEHO project 2008-2010). In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 4 (3), NJF Report, p. 18.
